Subjects: Christina, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Osbern Bokenam, Life of St. Christina — in 8-line stanzas

BLAru327.First Lines:
Whilom be syde the lake vulsyneStood a cyte wyche Tire clepyd
                    was…
BLAru327.Last Lines:
…Eternally god to preyse & magnytyeAmen mercy ihesu &
                    gramercy
BLAru327.Attributed Author:
Translated into englys be a doctor of dyuyinte clepyd Osbern
                    Bokenam…Wrytyn in Cambryge by hys sonn ffrer Thomas Burgh (index, f.
                    193)
BLAru327.Attributed Title:
Vita Sancta Christiana (later hand, f. 39v) The lyf of seynt
                    Crystyne (index, f. 193)
